examples.example: 考古学家发现了一具保存完好的古代化石。

translate.english: Archaeologists discovered a well-preserved ancient fossil.

examples.example: 勇敢的消防员从大火中抬出了一具受伤的老人。

translate.english: The brave firefighter carried out an injured old man from the big fire.

examples.example: 我在博物馆里看到了一具精美的恐龙骨架化石。

translate.english: I saw a beautiful dinosaur skeleton fossil in the museum.
